title: Winter Cricket Cage
description: slightly waisted six part secondary molded gourd with a slightly pointed bottom, used as a cricket carrier or cage; tortoiseshell bulging lid is intricately decorated with prunus blossom and has moving parts of phoenixes with inlaid eyes; main body of the gourd is decorated with a cellular design, containing stylised shou characters, with a border along the bottom of rui heads
creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
